tangram.title: Tangram
tangram.description: A traditional puzzle game that uses seven geometric pieces to create various shapes.

HowToPlay.title: How to Play:
HowToPlay.description1: Use seven pieces: two large triangles, one medium triangle, two small triangles, one square, and one parallelogram.
HowToPlay.description2: Drag pieces to move them and click to rotate.
HowToPlay.description3: Use all the pieces to complete the given shape.
HowToPlay.description4: Pieces cannot overlap or be left unused.

polyomino.title: Polyomino
polyomino.description: A puzzle game where you complete patterns using shapes made by connecting squares together.

HowToPlay.title: How to Play:
HowToPlay.description1: Use polyomino pieces made of squares joined edge to edge.
HowToPlay.description2: Drag pieces to move them and click to rotate.
HowToPlay.description3: Use all the pieces to complete the target shape.
HowToPlay.description4: There are various types such as Tetromino (4 squares) and Pentomino (5 squares).

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subTitle: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
